metadata.title: YDDPET 30pcs Nanoscale Cleaning Cloths, Reusable Microfiber Cleaning Cloth Without Water Marks for Kitchens, Glass, Cars and Windows (12in x 16in)
features: Soft Material:Microfiber Cleaning Cloth is Made of Soft Material With Fish Scale Grid Design, So It Will not Scratch Any Surface While Cleaning.
Good Water Absorption:The Microfiber Cloth is Woven by The More Advanced Weaving Technology and Has High Water Absorption Rate，Wipe the Glass Without Leaving a Trace.

Easy Clean Cloth:This Easy Clean Cloth Is Made of Microfiber Material, Which is Soft and Strong Enough to Clean Any Dirt or Stains on Your Phone or Computer Screen. You Can Quickly Clean Your Phone or Computer Screen with The Same Cloth That You Use for Your Face.
Size and Packaging:Clean up with These Microfiber Cleaning Cloths With 5 Colors and 10 Strips Per Pack，Multiple Colors can Also Avoid Cross Use.

Strong Applicability:This Cleaning Rags is a Highly Effective Cleaning Product.It Easily Removes Dirt and Grime From Most Surfaces. This High Quality Microfiber Cloth can Be Used for Cleaning Most Items Such As: Chairs, Couches, Tables, Glass,Appliances, Bathrooms, Kitchen, Etc.
description: Clean your house with this microfiber cleaning cloth. This cloth is soft and has a fish scale design for easy cleaning.  It absorbs water very well and leaves no traces.  This is a large size cloth that has 10 strips in 5 different colors. Cleaning cloth with fish scale design to wash the glass with no water.  Dish cloth to clean the glass with the fish scale design.  The dish cloth designed by fish scales has a good effect on cleaning glass
